mean_en: a funny drawing or picture of somebody that exaggerates some of their features; a description of a person or thing that makes them seem ridiculous by exaggerating some of their characteristics
sentence: I asked the artist to paint a caricature of myself. It was really funny!
sentence_trans: 我请艺术家给我画了一幅讽刺漫画，真是太有趣了！
word_etyma: carica=caric过分 + ture表名词 → 漫画；讽刺文
